Description: Gold hoop ear-ring with pendant club; hoop formed from two twisted pieces of gold wire secured with a ring and hook; a small, club-like pendant hangs from the ring, decorated with granulation.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (2527)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.119, Tomb 87A)
Laffineur et al. 1986 / Amathonte III. Testimonia 3. L'Orfèvrerie. Scarabées, scaraboïdes et cônes. La coupe en argent du British Museum (No. 123, pp.34, 92)
